explains: adj. 惊骇的；带有恐怖感的
v. 惊骇（horrify 的过去式和过去分词）；使……战悚

sentences.en: We were horrified at the conditions prevailing in local prisons.
sentences.cn: 地方监狱的普遍状况让我们震惊。

sentences.en: His family was horrified by the change.
sentences.cn: 他的家人对这一变化感到震惊。

sentences.en: She gazed at him in horrified disbelief.
sentences.cn: 她既惊愕又难以置信地盯着他。
